sourcesContent:
import { Dashboard } from "./Dashboard"; export function Detail({ product }) { return (

Details

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews} Reviews)
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Status: {product.status}
 ); }
